name: Undeath to Death
components: : V, S, M/DF (diamond powder worth 500 gp)
area: several undead creatures within a 40-ft.-radius burst
text: This spell functions like circle of death, except that it destroys undead creatures as noted above.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料/法器 (价值500gp的钻石尘)
area_zh: 半径40尺爆发范围内的不死生物
text_zh: 此法术作用类似‘死亡法阵 (circle of death)’，但本法术会如上文描述中的那样摧毁不死生物。
